name: Pointcloud
tagline: A PostgreSQL extension for storing point cloud (LIDAR) data.
body:
### Welcome to pgPointCloud simple home site

#### Introduction ####
 `@TODO : put a nice image in background`
Lidar point cloud are becoming more and more available. Devices are easy to get, not too expensive, and provide very accurate 3D points.
Yet using those Billions of points is a challenge.
**pgPointCLoud** is an open source PostgreSQL extension for storing point cloud (LIDAR) data and use it with PostGIS.
It is very easy to use, robust and efficient.
By sotring Lidar point in a PostgreSQL database, pgPointCloud ease many problems and allows a good integration with other geo-spatial data (vector,raster) into the common PostGIS framework.
